entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Port Colborne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Overcast. High zero.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
